thread.title: Salman Khan's Father Salim Khan Gets Discharged Post Hernia Operation
thread.title_full: Salman Khan's Father Salim Khan Gets Discharged Post Hernia Operation

title: Salman Khan's Father Salim Khan Gets Discharged Post Hernia Operation
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Salim Khan , who was admitted for a Hernia operation at Lilavati hospital has been discharged after his surgery was completed sucessfully.The entire family, including his three sons Salman Khan , Arbaaz Khan and Sohail Khan were present with him post-surgery.During the surgery, Salman Khan used to visit his father during the wee hours of morning and midnight as he knew his presence would cause unwanted disturbance at the hospital causing nuisance to patients.Salman Khan is like the other half of his father Salim Khan, and both the father and sun duo share a special bond with each other. 
We are happy that Salim Khan is discharged after a successful Hernia operation and wish him a happy and healthier life. Salim Khan Gets Discharged Post Hernia Operation 1/13 Discharged
